channel.title: In Need Of Help With Allowing Player Onto My Server
channel.description: Hello I have set up a server which will only allow me onto it. I have set up the port forwarder to allow any players onto it and when they connect it sais: connection lost, please wait attempting to re-establish as soon as they log on. How do I prevent this from happening? If you add my msn, bradleyd_000@hotmail.com i will allow you to use the remote assisstance to help me, those of what help will recive rep+. If my server then works i will help any person that needs help on making a server. Thanks, Brad :) Btw im using wanadoo wireless and the live box is invental.

item.title: In Need Of Help With Allowing Player Onto My Server
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

Um also in server.java serch for found = if you find anything and it says like a really low number make it 50 or so because i had that issue on my server when i set it up once it would only let two ppl on at once.

Read full topic
item.source: In Need Of Help With Allowing Player Onto My Server

item.title: In Need Of Help With Allowing Player Onto My Server
item.dc:creator: @Dodian Dodian
item.description:
@Dodian wrote:

Use http://canyouseeme.org to double-check that the port 43594 is open. Also, try using another server source.

Read full topic
item.source: In Need Of Help With Allowing Player Onto My Server

item.title: In Need Of Help With Allowing Player Onto My Server
item.dc:creator: @Brad Brad
item.description:
@Brad wrote:

Hello I have set up a server which will only allow me onto it. I have set up the port forwarder to allow any players onto it and when they connect it sais: connection lost, please wait attempting to re-establish as soon as they log on. How do I prevent this from happening? If you add my msn, bradleyd_000@hotmail.com i will allow you to use the remote assisstance to help me, those of what help will recive rep+. If my server then works i will help any person that needs help on making a server. Thanks, Brad
Btw im using wanadoo wireless and the live box is invental.
